p: All environmental layers were treated as follows: (1) resampled to the resolution of 1 km Ã— 1 km; (2) defined projection to GCS_WGS_1984; (3) clipped to the geographical area of China; (4) converted to ASCII format. All operations above were accomplished in ArcGIS 10.2. A strong correlation among bioclimate variables usually exists in the modeling, which may unjustifiably affect results [ 34]. The possible collinearity amongst the variables was investigated by calculating the variance inflation factor (VIF), using the car package in R [ 35, 36, 37]. The principle we selected the variables was that the VIF value is less than 10 [ 38].
